[THE.ORIGIN.STORY]

> Started as a curious kid who dismantled every electronic device in the house. My parents thought I was destructive - I was actually reverse-engineering the future.

> Today, I don't just write code - I architect solutions that shock the world. Every project is a chance to prove that the impossible is just another Tuesday for me.
